channel.title: AncientBlitz - Stable|Flawless Pk + Switches| 100% 508 maps|New log in
channel.description:
This server was in Development section before now its no where to be found, I decided I'm going to need some help. I have added very enhanced features to this PI. It's pk'ing and stability is near flawless. It loads cache through the server and loads up on start up just like real RS. There are 508 maps which are 100% besides some roof textures. Many new bosses are added + flawless. Teleports are through dialogue not magebook. Shops are opened through dialogue. Pk points are added but not 100% yet, duel arena is near flawless, I have not found any new bugs in it yet. Staking is 100%, and all dueling features work. More to be added soon. [center][size=14pt]Features![/size] - Cache is loaded through server. - Very Stable - Flawless Switching - 100% duel arena(All PI dupes fixed) - Over 85% Flawless combat system. - Teleporting through Dialogue's not Mage Book. - Pk points, Donar points, PK Point shop. - 80% Added Handcannon. - 100% hitmarks with every Sprite - Rocktail + Torva Hp effects! - 100% Constitution with every number working! Ex: If your 990 constitution and someone hits a 73 on you you will now have 917 Constitution. - More To be added!
Media!
Pictures!
Korasi Spec 100%: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/t54tqu.png[/img]
Newest Right Click Menu: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jr655j.png[/img]
Godwars Maps 100%: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/359wg8w.png[/img]
100% Quick Prayers: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2md3scp.png[/img] (More Coming soon)
Videos! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2jwWEkiDdV8 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gJ79_vW5ZeM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h92B8R9u_zo (NOTE: MUST WATCH IN HD AND FULLSCREEN!)
Applications:
Server Developer: [code] Name: Time zone: Language: Experience: Activity: Will you be dedicated?(Yes/No): Applying for?: [/code]
Client Programmer(NEED ONE QUICK): [code] Name: Time zone: Language: Experience: Activity: Will you be dedicated?(Yes/No): Applying for?: [/code]
Gfx Designer: [code] Name: Time zone: Language: Experience: Activity: Will you be dedicated?(Yes/No): Applying for?: [/code]
Html/Website programmer: [code] Name: Time zone: Language: Experience: Activity: Will you be dedicated?(Yes/No): Applying for?: [/code]
[size=24pt]Newest Update![/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-PHHnA96jH0
Please don't flame, more updates will come. Thanks. Credits: Insanity - for creating PI (If he is the one who did) [/center]

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable|Flawless Pk + Switches| 100% 508 maps|New log in
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:25, topic:430245”][quote author=kill you704 link=topic=532923.msg3895723#msg3895723 date=1327275026]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=532923.msg3895620#msg3895620 date=1327271758]

Nothing interesting

Honestly, Don’t reply to a topic without reading, I specifically state that all I have worked on is stability and Pk.
Don’t troll my topic just to look cool.

I see the new pics. Still nothing interesting…

Nothing interesting? Okay, smart ass, lets see you load a Project Insanity base with cache loading through source. Then once I see you accomplish this, then is when you many reply to this topic. From then on, don’t ever reply to this topic again.
[/quote] what has specifically been done to improve stability?

I’m not going to sit here and give a tutorial on everything that has been done, but the main things are is cleaning it up and adding new processors to improve how fast the server runs. There are 508 maps which kinda slow it down but other than that its a a pretty stable base. It also depends on what your hosting computer is, if its a 1gb piece of shit then obviously it will lag, but if you have 100+ players online with a 5gb + hosting computer, it will be fairly stable and that would probably be the max at the moment.
[/quote]Not being mean…but… the ram doesn’t mean a lot to be totally honest. The main thing that causes lag is unclosed nulls, memory leaks, stuff running through process, and how good your internet is.[/quote] that is true^

Read full topic

[/quote] what has specifically been done to improve stability?

I’m not going to sit here and give a tutorial on everything that has been done, but the main things are is cleaning it up and adding new processors to improve how fast the server runs. There are 508 maps which kinda slow it down but other than that its a a pretty stable base. It also depends on what your hosting computer is, if its a 1gb piece of shit then obviously it will lag, but if you have 100+ players online with a 5gb + hosting computer, it will be fairly stable and that would probably be the max at the moment.[/quote]Not being mean…but… the ram doesn’t mean a lot to be totally honest. The main thing that causes lag is unclosed nulls, memory leaks, stuff running through process, and how good your internet is.

item.title: AncientBlitz - Stable|Flawless Pk + Switches| 100% 508 maps|New log in
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:19, topic:430245”]Why does the cache load through the source?
What’s the point of that[/quote]
More efficient and faster way of loading the server…
It doesn’t have to download the cache like every other server does, and honestly alot of players get annoyed at the 3-5minutes of a white screen downloading the cache.
Mine takes 10-15 seconds to start the client the first time you ever open it.

Read full topic
